attributes.action: allow everyone free fruit and veg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i urge the prime minister and his goverment to give free fruit and veg to everyone who has had a heart attack or stroke this will make sure that they receive all the fruite and veg they need to have a balance diet after all there are people out there that cannot afford to buy these things like the people who are on benefits and the older people
